title: League Client not opening
body:
I've not been able to open League client since yesterday. 
I would click on League of Legends and it the League of Legends sign would appear but it would open to nothing. 
I've basically tried very method of deleting the folders, etc and i dont have avast antivirus so i dont know what to do now. 
I really don't want to reinstall and then download the game again..
Please help asap.

replies.body:
Hey there,

What exactly have you attempted already?
